Company History

Established in 1977 in the Emirate of Abu Dhabi, (HPE) has undergone several transformations and is today recognized as a market leader in its field.

Initially named Nael Energy & General Enterprises, the business was always dedicated to the Energy & Infrastructure industry as a Contractor providing various services.

A heavy emphasis on water & power projects to compliment an ever-increasing infrastructure division, the Company contributed to the Emirate’s continued growth & development.

The Company’s transformation led to a management buyout in 2017 which resulted in a name change to Hydropower Energy and General Construction.

The Company underwent a radical restructuring process over the next years resulting in a new operational structure and at the same time maintaining its historic experience and background.

Today the Company boasts a highly successful & innovative management structure which will lead it in today’s everchanging world of industry.

Our core values:

Excellence: We strive for excellence in quality, and we continuously innovate, utilizing advanced technologies.

Teamwork: We insist on mutual respect, cooperation and mutual encouragement to achieve each individual’s potential.

Integrity: We act with reliability, honesty and fairness.

Commitment: We are fully dedicated to delivering our objectives through the most efficient use of resources.

Sustainability: We are committed to safeguarding all stakeholders, including especially the health and safety of our employees, society as a whole and the environment.

Hydropower accountability: We are fully accountable for carrying out our responsibilities in accordance to the values and principles of HYDROPOWER.

Vision

To be recognized in the region for Engineering, Procurement and Construction of Energy & Infrastructure sector by providing high-standard services addressing customer’s needs in a professional and dynamic manner.

Mission

We will conduct our business activities in a safe manner that is consistent with the international best practices providing timely and responsible solutions and ensuring value for money to all our customers.

Values

Integrity, Respect, Technical excellence, and continuous improvement.

Vision

  • To be the leading Engineering, Procurement and Construction company in the Middle East, for the infrastructure, industrial and energy sectors.
  • To respond to the changing needs of clients.
  • To provide responsive and competent services to our Client with a constructive contribution to the success of the projects, within time and budget.
  • To respect, recognize and fairly reward the employees through appropriate compensation, training and development.
  • To provide significant returns to our stake holders.
  • To carry out business activities in a manner that is consistent with International practices and providing Quality, Safe & Healthy working environment.
  • To be socially responsible, optimizing the use of local human and capital resources and by contributing to the development of the region.
  • Environment Protection and sustainable construction.

Mission

  • Ensure Value added performance to our Clients.
  • To attain total professionalism.
  • To strive & sustain Integrated Management system(IMS)
  • To maintain & extend the list of fully satisfied clients with zero complaints
  • Enhance our Clients satisfaction by providing value added services in a timely manner.

Values

  • Ensure high standards of Quality, Health and Safety as primary objective in all our activities.
  • Respect for our Code of Ethics.
  • Ensure accountability, transparency, and integrity in our dealings.
  • Committed to social responsibility and obligations to the environment.
